To run this code please click on the “Play” button on the cell below. Results will be printed as part of the cell output (ensure you click on Show outputs on the top right corner of the cell).

paragraphs.text:
%consumer.pyspark

# Number of leads (over last hour and day)


import json

from pyspark.streaming.kafka import KafkaUtils
from pyspark.streaming import StreamingContext

# Stop previous streaming context
try:
    ssc.stop(stopSparkContext=True, stopGracefully=False)
except:
    pass

# Create streaming context
ssc = StreamingContext(sc, batchDuration=5)
ssc.checkpoint("checkpoint")

# Kafka configuration
kafka_topic = "test-topic"
kafka_broker = "kafka:9092"

# Stream window configuration
# Reduce last day of data, refreshing every 5 seconds
total_window_last_hour = 3600 # Number of seconds in a hour
total_window_last_day = 86400 # Number of seconds in a day
refresh_window = 5

# Process stream
stream = KafkaUtils.createDirectStream(ssc, [kafka_topic], {"metadata.broker.list": kafka_broker})
json_stream = stream.map(lambda x: json.loads(x[1]))
lead_count_stream = json_stream.map(lambda x: ('leads_count', 1))

# Count past day
num_leads_last_day_stream = lead_count_stream.reduceByKeyAndWindow(lambda x, y: x + y, lambda x, y: x - y, total_window_last_day, refresh_window)
last_day_output_stream = num_leads_last_day_stream.map(lambda x: ('last_day_leads_count', x[1]))

# Count past hour
num_leads_last_hour_stream = lead_count_stream.reduceByKeyAndWindow(lambda x, y: x + y, lambda x, y: x - y, total_window_last_hour, refresh_window)
last_hour_output_stream = num_leads_last_hour_stream.map(lambda x: ('last_hour_leads_count', x[1]))

# Print outputs
last_hour_output_stream.pprint()
last_day_output_stream.pprint()

ssc.start()
ssc.awaitTermination()

paragraphs.text:
%consumer.pyspark

# Top 10 locations with most leads (over last hour and day)

import json

from pyspark.streaming.kafka import KafkaUtils
from pyspark.streaming import StreamingContext

# Create streaming context
ssc = StreamingContext(sc, batchDuration=5)
ssc.checkpoint("checkpoint")

# Kafka configuration
kafka_topic = "test-topic"
kafka_broker = "kafka:9092"

# Stream window configuration
# Reduce last day of data, refreshing every 5 seconds
total_window_last_hour = 3600 # Number of seconds in a hour
total_window_last_day = 86400 # Number of seconds in a day
refresh_window = 5


# Process stream
stream = KafkaUtils.createDirectStream(ssc, [kafka_topic], {"metadata.broker.list": kafka_broker})
json_stream = stream.map(lambda x: json.loads(x[1]))
location_stream = json_stream.map(lambda x: (x['Location'], 1))

# Count past day
location_count_stream_last_day = location_stream.reduceByKeyAndWindow(lambda x, y: x + y, lambda x, y: x - y, total_window_last_day, refresh_window)
last_day_output_stream = location_count_stream_last_day.map(lambda x: (x[0] + ' (Last day)', x[1]))

# Count past hour
location_count_stream_last_hour = location_stream.reduceByKeyAndWindow(lambda x, y: x + y, lambda x, y: x - y, total_window_last_hour, refresh_window)
last_hour_output_stream = location_count_stream_last_hour.map(lambda x: (x[0] + ' (Last hour)', x[1]))


# Uncomment this to see a running print-out of the stream results
last_hour_output_stream.pprint()
last_day_output_stream.pprint()

ssc.start()
ssc.awaitTermination()

To run this code please click on the “Play” button on the cell below. Results will be printed as part of the cell output (ensure you click on Show outputs on the top right corner of the cell).

paragraphs.text:
%consumer.pyspark

# Total number of historical leads

import json

from pyspark.streaming.kafka import KafkaUtils
from pyspark.streaming import StreamingContext

# Create streaming context
ssc = StreamingContext(sc, batchDuration=5)
ssc.checkpoint("checkpoint")

# Kafka configuration
kafka_topic = "test-topic"
kafka_broker = "kafka:9092"

# Initial global state
globalStateRDD = sc.parallelize([])

# Function to update global state at each interval
def updateState(new_values, last_sum):
    return sum(new_values) + (last_sum or 0)

# Process stream
stream = KafkaUtils.createDirectStream(ssc, [kafka_topic], {"metadata.broker.list": kafka_broker})
json_stream = stream.map(lambda x: json.loads(x[1]))
lead_count_stream = json_stream.map(lambda x: ('total_leads_count', 1))

# Count total leads
num_leads_stream = lead_count_stream.reduceByKey(lambda x, y: x + y)
update_state_stream = num_leads_stream.updateStateByKey(updateState, initialRDD=globalStateRDD)

# Uncomment this to see a running print-out of the stream results
update_state_stream.pprint()

ssc.start()
ssc.awaitTermination()
